ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong class called in api_receptions.class.php causes _validate method to crash
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Bug, current version 18.0.0-beta. https://github.com/Dolibarr/dolibarr/blob/61c5400d772336b4a6ad124f4471af833cce6827/htdocs/reception/class/api_receptions.class.php#L712C43-L712C43 It seems that the wrong class is called here. If i'm not mistaken, this should be the Receptions class and not the Shipments class.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #25250 : Wrong class name in function
Merge pull request #25267 from Hystepik/develop#5 Fix #25250 : Wrong class name in function
